# Preferred data sources

The recommended source of data  for a specific health  indicator. This  can include: civil registration and  vital statistics  systems; surveillance;  national  population-based  surveys;  routine facility information  systems;  health facility  assessments; administrative  data  sources; human resources  information  systems; laboratory  information systems (50,51).
